header.title: New Log
header.explainer: Learn how to get the best AI estimates

paywall.title: AI Logging is a Pro Feature
paywall.body: Log meals effortlessly with a photo, text, or your voice.

cameraDenied.title: Camera permission denied
cameraDenied.message: Please allow camera access in settings to take photos.

microphoneDenied.title: Microphone permission denied
microphoneDenied.message: Please allow microphone access in settings to use voice input.

aiEstimation.title: Pro tips for best results

bullets.weights: Add weights or volumes for precision (e.g., "150g chicken breast" vs. "chicken breast").
bullets.details: Mention cooking methods or standout ingredients (e.g., "grilled with olive oil").

bullets.frame: Keep every item in frame and uncovered.

bullets.tone: Speak naturallyâ€”as if you were typing.
bullets.details: Mention weights, ingredients, and cooking methods.

aiEstimation.footer: For the most accurate results, use measured quantities whenever you can.

primary.label: Calories & Protein
primary.title: Primary
primary.description: Hit these to stay on track with your gain/loss target and build muscle.

secondary.label: Fat
secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: Meet this baseline to support hormones and nutrient absorption.

filler.label: Carbs
filler.title: Filler
filler.description: Your go-to workout fuel. Enjoy carbs freely once calories, protein, and fat are covered.

bullets.ring: The ring fills as you log meals.
bullets.close: Close the ring to hit today's budget.

bullets.weekly: Judge progress by your weekly average, not a single day.

bullets.ring: The ring fills as you log protein.
bullets.close: Close the ring to reach today's minimum protein target.

bullets.eachMeal: Include a protein source in every meal or snack.
bullets.spread: Spread intake throughout the day for better recovery.
bullets.over: Going slightly over is fineâ€”aim to meet or gently exceed the target.

hitTarget.title: Hit your daily target
hitTarget.body: Aim for a steady baseline each day to keep energy and meals satisfying.

why.title: Why it matters
why.body: Dietary fat supports hormones, helps absorb vitamins, and keeps you full.

bullets.cook: Cook with olive or avocado oil; include nuts, seeds, whole eggs, and salmon.
bullets.balance: Saturated fat is fine in moderationâ€”balance it across the day.

total.title: A flexible total
total.body: No fixed targetâ€”carbs fill remaining calories after protein and fat. Expect the number to vary day to day.

bullets.adjust: Increase on hard training days; scale down on rest days.
bullets.timing: Choose slower-digesting carbs most of the time; use faster carbs around workouts.

bullets.whole: Rice, potatoes, oats, beans, fruit, whole-grain breads or wraps.
bullets.limit: Limit sugary drinks and ultra-processed sweets.

common.missingData: Missing required data. Please go back and complete all fields.

targetMethod.title: How would you like to set your nutrition targets?
targetMethod.subtitle: Choose the approach that works best for you.

calculate.title: Calculate for Me
calculate.description: Answer a few questions about your body and goals to get personalized targets
calculate.accessibilityHint: Answer questions about your stats and goals to calculate personalized daily targets

manual.title: I Know My Targets
manual.description: Set custom macro goals manually if you already have your targets
manual.accessibilityHint: Manually enter your daily calorie, protein, fat, and carb targets

accessibility.label: Select {{option}} as biological sex
accessibility.hint: Helps calculate your calorie needs and moves to the next step

height.title: And your height?
height.subtitle: For an accurate TDEE calculation.
height.tooltip: TDEE stands for Total Daily Energy Expenditureâ€”the estimated calories you burn each day based on your stats and activity level.

weight.title: What's your current weight?
weight.subtitle: This sets the starting point for your goals.

activityLevel.title: How active are you?
activityLevel.subtitle: Select your baseline. This is used to calibrate your TDEE.

sedentary.title: Sedentary
sedentary.description: Little to no exercise. Desk job with minimal physical activity throughout the day.
sedentary.label: Sedentary Lifestyle

light.title: Light Activity
light.description: Light exercise 1-3 days per week. Some walking or light recreational activities.
light.label: Lightly Active

moderate.title: Moderate Activity
moderate.description: Moderate exercise 3-5 days per week. Regular gym sessions or sports activities.
moderate.label: Moderately Active

active.title: Active
active.description: Moderate exercise 6-7 days per week, or intense training 3-4 times weekly.
active.label: Active

veryactive.title: Very Active
veryactive.description: Very heavy physical work or 6-7 intense training sessions per week. Professional athlete level activity.
veryactive.label: Very Active

calorieGoal.title: What's the objective?
calorieGoal.subtitle: Based on your data, here are three starting points with daily calorie targets.
calorieGoal.missingData: Missing calculation data. Please start over.

lose.title: Cut
lose.description: Create a calorie deficit to lose weight gradually
lose.accessibilityHint: Set {{calories}} calories per day to lose weight gradually

maintain.title: Maintain
maintain.description: Eat at maintenance calories to stay at current weight
maintain.accessibilityHint: Set {{calories}} calories per day to stay at current weight

gain.title: Bulk
gain.description: Create a calorie surplus to gain weight gradually
gain.accessibilityHint: Set {{calories}} calories per day to gain weight gradually

proteinGoal.title: Set Your Protein Target
proteinGoal.subtitle: Based on your weight of {{weight}}kg
proteinGoal.subtitleFallback: Choose the protein strategy that fits your training.

baseline.title: The Baseline
baseline.description: Balanced & healthy. Ideal for an active lifestyle and maintaining general fitness.

exerciser.title: The Exerciser
exerciser.description: Fit & toned. Supports training results and building muscle.

athlete.title: The Athlete
athlete.description: Maximum muscle gain. Optimal with intense strength training.

diet_phase.title: The Diet Phase
diet_phase.description: Protection & satiety. Maximizes muscle retention during a calorie deficit.

proteinGoal.accessibilityHint: Select {{factor}} grams per kilogram protein goal. {{description}}

manualInput.title: Set Your Nutrition Targets
manualInput.subtitle: Allocate your daily calories across macronutrients.
manualInput.carbsHelper: Calculated from remaining calories. Carbs provide 4 kcal per gram.

manualSummary.title: Your Daily Blueprint
manualSummary.subtitle: Review your custom targets and start tracking.
manualSummary.helper: Carbs are calculated from your remaining calories. Since carbs provide 4 kcal per gram, the remaining {{calories}} kcal are filled with {{carbs}}g of carbs.

calculatorSummary.title: Your Daily Blueprint
calculatorSummary.subtitle: Here are your starting targets. You can adjust these anytime.
calculatorSummary.helper: Note: Small variations may occur due to rounding.

calorieControl.helper: Most athletes consume 2000-3500 kcal/day depending on their goals and activity level.

macrosCard.staleMessage: Values reflect previous ingredients and amounts.

validation.nameShort: Name must be at least {{count}} characters.
validation.nameLong: Name must be less than {{count}} characters.
validation.amountInvalid: Enter a valid amount greater than 0.
validation.amountPrecision: Amount can have at most 1 decimal place.

discard.title: Discard changes?
discard.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

delete.title: Delete Ingredient
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this ingredient?

accessibility.editHint: Opens editor to modify amount and unit

swipeActions.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
swipeActions.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

subscription.label: SUBSCRIPTION
subscription.canceledWithoutDate: Auto-renew canceled. Access until current period ends.
subscription.upgradeDescription: Ingredient detection, Nutrition estimation, effortless tracking.

restore.title: Already subscribed?
restore.subtitle: Restore purchases after reinstalling the app or switching devices.

notFound.title: Nothing to restore
notFound.message: We couldn't find past purchases for this Apple ID.

language.title: Language
language.subtitle: Pick how the app is translated.

seed.title: Seed Sample Logs
seed.subtitle: Add demo logs for QA flows.

alert.message: This deletes all logs and any saved photos. This cannot be undone.

alert.title: Clear Nutrition Goals
